text: Murder in Yolpalas () is a 1955 Turkish drama film directed by Metin Erksan, based on the novel by Halide Edip Adivar. It stars Uğur Başaran, Altan Karındaş, and Bülent Oran. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish drama films Category:1955 drama films Category:Films directed by Metin Erksan
title: Murder in Yolpalas
